body.name: wantdo Women's Waterproof Trench Coat Classic Lapel Outerwear Coat with Belt
features: Stay Cozy All Day - Regardless of the season, our trench coats for women will keep you comfortable and warm. With this women's elegant raincoat thick outer shell, you can stay confident and cozy no matter where life takes you.

Protection You Deserve - Made with waterproof fabric, our waterproof trench coat is designed to keep you dry even when it rains. Each women's windproof trench coat also has a double-breasted closure to shield you from strong winds.

Style Meets Function - Complete with a removable belt and adjustable cuffs, you can style this ladies dress coat in multiple ways. In addition, our women's waterproof overcoat also has 2 deep pockets that you can use to store your essentials.

Variety of Designs - Our double-breasted trench coats come in a wide range of colors and sizes (XS to 2XL), so you can find one that complements your skin tone and personal style. Whether you prefer bold colors or muted neutrals, we've got you covered.

Pair with Any Outfit - Wear the long coats for women with your jeans, shorts, dress, or suits in spring, fall or winter for a chic look. The polyester fabric of this windproof long jacket also withstands wrinkles so you can wear it straight to work! Please check the size chart on our website before purchasing to ensure the perfect fit.
body.description: Stay Warm and Dry in Style with the Waterproof and Windproof Women's Trench Coat By Wantdo Whether you're going to work, traveling abroad, or going on a date, you must ensure that you're properly dressed for the chilly weather brought about by winter or autumn. You also have to be ready for any sudden downpours during rainy seasons. The only problem is that most women's trench coats that provide adequate warmth and protection are often too bulky or don’t go with any of your outfits. You need a women's trench coat that combines style, comfort, and quality! Flexible and functional features keep you stay stylish and comfortable during the cold and snowy winter. Wantdo classic lapel trench coat for ladies uses comfortable fabrics and classic design to keep you warm while also showcasing your elegance. Our double-breasted pea coat is a classic coat with a double-breasted design and slim fit, keeping you stylish in cold weather. Our women's water-repellent trench coat with a waterproof rating of 3000mm is your perfect choice. It uses a soft and breathable lining design to keep you dry and comfortable. Our women's trench coat includes a variety of styles and colors to meet the needs of women of different body types.

These pockets of Wantdo fall coat for women also help keep your hands warm during chilly mornings or if you forget your gloves. Classic Lapel Classic Lapel gives the women's trench coat a formal style, not only focuses on enhancing appearance but also provides additional protection and warmth to the neck, particularly in cold weather, effectively shielding against the wind and cold for you.This women's trench coat makes you elegant and formal on all occasions.

Wantdo’s Fall Coat Collection 33992 The Wantdo classic double breasted trench coat with functionality and durability. Not Just A Trench Coat Wantdo mid-length ladies jackets are crafted using soft and lightweight fabric, which helps insulate your body and keeps you warm in the cool weather. Each Wantdo women’s overcoat also has a water resistant shell layer, you can wear it as a raincoat in slight rainy and foggy weather. Superior Cold Protection Wantdo trench coat for women comes with a double-breasted storm flap button closure, which ensures that your warm winter outerwear won't suddenly fly open while you're outside or walking to work. Enjoy the great outdoors while keeping yourself protected from light rain drizzles and strong winds with Wantdo’s trench coat for women Thoughtfully Designed and Expertly Crafted Wantdo women’s dress coat is designed to provide additional warmth and protection while you're outdoors. Feel confident and ready to conquer your daily tasks with Wantdo’s trench coat for women that always looks like it's steamed or ironed out without much effort. Stylish and Functional With the Wantdo women’s overcoat's detachable buckle waist belt and adjustable cuffs, you get more style options to choose from. You can cinch Wantdo formal coat’s waist with the belt for a curvy silhouette or unfasten the buttons to show off your outfit and enjoy better mobility. Notes: - Flexible and functional features keep you stay stylish and comfortable during the cold and snowy winter. - A basic and essential women’s trench coat for cold weather outdoor activities and daily commutes. - A perfect gift choice for your family and loved ones during Thanksgiving, Christmas and New Year.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great casual trench! But...belt buckle should be changed, and FYI, welt pockets do not button closed.
reviews.reviewText: I have the black trench coat. It's a really a nice, casual trench! Seems well-made and should last. No loose or forgotten threads to trim. 100% poly so it resists water well, but does get soaked through in prolonged rain (I live in the rainy NW).Fits well. I'm busty so finding coats that will close at the bust usually means they are too big at shoulders, arms and hips. This one fits! I can close it and I'm not swimming in it everywhere else!While I would deduct 1 star for the pockets and the belt, I'm really happy with this coat so far so I won't. But...Pockets: While they are welt pockets and very roomy, they don't button closed as they appear. I know welt pockets may or may not fasten closed, but the photos convinced me they would. Full disclosure about that would have be nice in the description.Belt: Really needs a sliding buckle as is normal for trench coats. Instead, it is a fixed one on the end. This means you have a verrrrry long length of belt hanging down, or you'd have to feed it through the loops all the way around the back and to the front again. Can't imagine. I'm sure that's why the model is wearing it tied in a bow. ;o)I'm trying to find a different buckle, but looks like I will have to go for a whole new belt...or see if my dry cleaner can do anything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable black buttons & high quality material
reviews.reviewText: The fabric is functional and actually white! I got it to match a cute pair of high heel boots & it is perfect!! The coat was packed perfectly with care, like it was going to be hung on a sales floor. I'm 5'9" & 146lb so a Large was just the right size. This is going to be my new anywhere & everything jacket, casual & stylish that is able to be dressed up or down. I HIGHLY recommend this coat! I already got compliments as soon as I walked out the door :D

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The size doesn't feel great, I'm not sure if it's a good fit so I hope maybe change it for a more suitable size, aside from that it feels pretty nice, I wish that all the buttons where real buttons but it's not to bad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Coat is perfect for a rain, wind and a fall day. It’s true to size too. Perfect length. Definitely told my friends about this coat and they also bought one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Bought two sizes; sent both back
reviews.reviewText: I am 5'0" and wear a petite 0, however, I am large breasted. Initially purchased this in XS in black. No complaints except it was just way too tight in the chest. I returned it and decided to try it in a small. This opened up more color options, so I picked the wine. I could tell immediately that the fabric was not the same quality. It looked and felt cheaper. This one did fit in the chest area but it was too big everywhere else. It also came to me without a belt. (It was packaged differently, so I suspect this was another person's return.) It's a fairly cute coat for the price though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Be sure to size up
reviews.reviewText: I love this coat! I love the plain black that matches everything. Good material. And warm enough I've worn it in 30 degree weather and have been fine but also good for your typical cool day. The only issue is to make sure you size up. I am 5'3"/200lbs and usually wear a L/XL and I had to swap this coat out for a 2XL.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the material it fits perfect the coat is light not heavy and soft I'm 5'1" and I'm glad I bought the xL the reason being is the coat is made small the xL is like a large. The coat looks great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good costume, only fit ok
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as part of a costume. It fits oddly in the shoulders and was a little tight. Buy a size up.
Very fancy. Color looks good on me. A little long on the arms but still love it.

Me encantó el color, un rojo rubí hermoso pero debí pedir la extra chica, la chica me quedó enorme. Mido 1.52 y peso 47 kg y la tendrán que ajustar, pero de muy buena calidad y completamente repelente al agua

Hatte nicht viel Qualität erwartet, muss meine Vermutung zumindest nach dem ersten Eindruck revidieren. Schöner, klassischer Trench, der größengerecht passt. Hübsch zu Leggings oder Rock, in jeder Farbe ein Evergreen. Gerade kleinere Frauen, die in langen Trenchcoats leicht verloren aussehen, machen bei der Wahl dieses Modells nicht viel falsch. Das Material ist fest und hält einem kleinen Nieselregen stand. Eine Regenjacke ersetzt der Mantel freilich nicht, zumal er keine Kapuze besitzt. Auch der Verzicht auf Schulterpolster gefällt mir, da diese oft etwas lächerlich wirken. Wäre schön, wenn der Mantel einige Jahre hält. Er ist zeitlos und solide.
Well made. True to size. Good weight to it. Highly recommend
Para mi y me encanto tal y como se describe excelente calidad
